basic.description: This course concentrates on a specific literary movement such as Romanticism, Realism, Expressionism, or on a period such as the Baroque, the Enlightenment, or the Weimar period. May be repeated to a maximum of nine semester hours.
basic.subject: GEW
basic.title: Studies in a Period or Movement

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: Two 3000-level courses or instructor permission.
